title: Natalie Portman rocks red sweater and chic black trousers at Variety's Power Of Women event
text:
She's confirmed in July that she is returning to the Marvel Cinematic Universe in Thor: Love And Thunder.

And Natalie Portman certainly looked ready for action on Friday as she attended Variety's Power of Women event in Los Angeles.

The Black Swan star, 38, rocked a red sweater and chic black trousers for the dazzling event where she was joined by a host of other A-list stars.

Amazing: Natalie Portman put on a classy display on Friday as she attended Variety's Power of Women event in Los Angeles

Natalie added to her look with a pair of cute black flats, while her radiant palette of make-up added to her look.

The Star Ward beauty curled bronze tresses hung loosely above her shoulders.

A host of other stars were at the A-list event, including songstress Mariah Carey, Jennifer Aniston and Brie Larson.

Mariah commanded attention in a glittering black gown that showcased her incredible body, while Jennifer looked amazing in a pinstripe dress.

Smart: The Black Swan star, 38, rocked a red sweater and chic black trousers for the A-list event as she was joined by a host of other A-list stars

Chic: Natalie added to her look with a pair of cute black heels, while her radiant palette of make-up added to her look

It comes after Natalie revealed that she became friends with Britney Spears when the pair shared the same first job as children.

'We very coincidentally were understudies for the same show when we were kids, so we both were like child actresses,' she said on Tuesday's episode of A Little Late With Lilly Singh.

'She understudied and then she got the part in the Mickey Mouse Club, she left and I took over for her.'

A host of other stars were at the A-list event, including songstress Mariah Carey who commanded attention in a glittering black gown that showcased her incredible body

'She was really great': Natalie previously revealed that she became friends with Britney Spears when the pair shared the same first job as children

Though their career paths followed wildly different trajectories, the pair reunited in their late teens to host a New Year's Eve party together.

At the party, the pair talked about their unusual connection.

Natalie added: 'And so then when we were like 18, and both of us had had different careers, she obviously became a pop icon and I was acting, and then we met up again and we were like, "We both had the same first job!" It's wild.

'And we had a party together, and she was really great.'

Movie star: Jennifer Anniston looked amazing in a pinstripe dress and she flashed her toned arms and legs in the stylish look

Photos from the 2003 party capture Natalie and Britney getting along famously. As fate would have it, their stars would continue to grow over the years.

After getting her start on the Mickey Mouse Club, Britney became a household name as she continued to release hit after hit over the years.

And the year after the party, Britney won her very first Grammy award for Toxic.

Natalie enjoyed equal amounts of success in her acting career. The Harvard-educated actress received an Academy Award in 2010 for her role in the psychological horror film Black Swan.
description: The Black Swan star, 38, rocked a red sweater and chic black trousers for the dazzling event where she was joined by a host of other A-list stars
